[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat

abbrev omnimath578_answer : ℕ → ℕ := sorry
theorem omnimath578 (n : ℕ) :
  (digits 10 (∏ i in Finset.range (n + 1), (10^(2^i) - 1))).sum = omnimath578_answer n := by sorry. Enumerated answers: n=0, product=9, digit_sum=9
n=1, product=891, digit_sum=18
